a22.l: select caption||'('||name||')' from dwb_iviews where name = :iname
select coalesce(max(cast(replace(f_name,'column','') as numeric)),0) +1 from dwb_iviewcols where iname = :iname and isquerycol ='F'
select count(*) as maxnum from dwb_iviewcols where iname=:iname
select dwb_iviewmainid from dwb_iviewmain where iname=:iname
select dwb_iviewsqlid from dwb_iviewsql where iname=:iname
select count(*) as maxnum from dwb_iviewparams where iname=:iname
select case when substring( :f_name,1,1) ~* '[^a-z]'='true' then 'F' else 'T' end
select case when :f_name ~* '[^a-z0-9_]'='true' then 'F' else 'T' end

validchk.a14: iif(fcharcheck= {F},{ Name should always start with character}, iif(validchk={F},{Special Characters are not allowed in Name},{T}))

a22.l: select cast(name||'('||caption||')' as varchar(100)) from dwb_iviewscripts where iname = :iname
order by 1
select dwb_iviewhyplinkid from dwb_iviewhyplink where iname = :iname and hypsource = :f_name
select dwb_iviewcformatid from dwb_iviewcformat where iname = :iname and name = :f_name
select task from dwb_iviewsql where iname = :iname
select COALESCE(cast(max(ordno) as bigint),0) +1 a from dwb_iviewcols where iname= :iname
select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.ntransid,')') as varchar(500)) frmcap,b.ntransid from vw_field_informations a,axpdef_tstruct b
where a.transid = b.ntransid
and coalesce(a.masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask'
order by 1

maskformcaption.a14: iif(mask={T} & isempty(maskformcaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',name,')') as varchar(500)) fcaption,name,masking,maskchar,maskroles,firstcharmask,lastcharmask from vw_field_informations
where transid= :masktransid and
coalesce(masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask'
order by 1

maskfieldcaption.a14: iif(mask={T} & isempty(maskfieldcaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.ntransid,')') as varchar(500)) frmcap,b.ntransid from vw_field_informations a,axpdef_tstruct b
where a.transid = b.ntransid
and coalesce(a.encrypted,'F')='T'
order by 1

encryptformcap.a14: iif(encryption={T} & isempty(encryptformcap)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',name,')') as varchar(500)) fcaption,name from vw_field_informations
where transid= :encrypttransid and
coalesce(encrypted,'F')='T'
order by 1

encryptfldcap.a14: iif(encryption={T} & isempty(encryptfldcap)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select cast(cn as varchar(30)) cn,rep from
(select 'Suffix with Cr' cn,'cr' rep from dual
union all
select 'Suffix with Db' cn,'db' from dual
union all
select 'Within brackets' cn,'br' from dual)a
where 'Numeric' = :dtype
order by 1

exprset.l0: firesql({d1},{delete from dwb_iviewhyplink di where dwb_iviewhyplinkid = :dwb_iviewhyplinkid})
exprset.l2: firesql({d3},{delete from dwb_iviewcformat di where dwb_iviewcformatid = :dwb_iviewcformatid})
exprset.l3: firesql({d4},{delete from dwb_iviewcformatdtl di where dwb_iviewcformatid = :dwb_iviewcformatid})

exprset.l0: firesql({a},{update dwb_iviews set imodifiedon=now(),imodifiedby= :username where name=:iname})
